pull.title: test: Increase initial RPC timeout to 60 seconds
pull.body:
When running the tests locally with a parallelism of 4 on an otherwise busy system, RPC can take quite a wait to come up.

With the current timeout tests often fail with "Unable to connect to bitcoind".

Change the timeout to 60 seconds just to be safe.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.body:
utACK. I'm afk until Wednesday so I can't test, but this seems like a reasonable change.

Slight preference for the variable names within the function to be lower case.

events.message:

busy system, RPC can take quite a wait to come up.
